She said she was so pleased to see one of her early designs still around, and what was lovely is she said, You know, Yvonne, its clients like you that make my job worthwhile.
I nearly burst into tea… [+1796 chars]

articles.author: Shannon Grixti
articles.title: eBay Will Have Spider-Man Miles Morales For $39 Today - Press Start Australia
articles.description: Another week brings another great eBay Tuesday deal. eBay will have Spider-Man Miles Morales on PS5 for $39 tomorrow (Tuesday). This is by far and away the best deal for the game since it came out in November. It’ll be available at 10am AEST and 4pm AEST (500…
